name: rgss-script-editor
description: It allows to edit RPG Maker ruby script files extracting them from the Scripts.rvdata2 bundled data

rgssScriptEditor.debug.logToConsole.description: Enables this extension to log information to the debug console

rgssScriptEditor.debug.logToFile.description: Enables this extension to log information to a file

rgssScriptEditor.external.backUpsFolder.description: The relative path within the project's folder where all back ups will be saved

rgssScriptEditor.external.scriptsFolder.description: The relative path within the project's folder where all scripts will be extracted

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.gameExecutable.description: The relative path to the game executable inside the project folder

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.automaticArgum.description: Allows the extension to determine the appropiate game executable arguments based on the RGSS version (When this mode is enabled custom arguments are ignored)

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.editorTestMode.description: Whether to run the game on test mode or not (This flag is ignored when using custom arguments)

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.nativeConsole.description: Whether to allow a console window to appear on game execution or not, only RPG Maker VX Ace (This flag is ignored when using custom arguments)

rgssScriptEditor.gameplay.customArgument.description: Set your own custom arguments here separated by a whitespace (You must disable 'auto. arguments detection' behavior to use this)

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile && yarn run lint
